data.actual_result: The invite does embed but never gets resolved.
data.expected_result: The invite embeds and gets resolved.
data.short_description: If you captitalise the first letter and the and the first letter after a hyphen in link that contains a hypen, the invite embed doesn't come out of the resolving state.
data.steps_to_repro: - In an invite link that contains hyphens, capitalize "d" of discord, the first letter of the invite and the first letter aftee the hypen. - Send the invite somewhere. - Look at the embed.
